document_data.mainbody: '''Rathloff''' was a sage from [[Ramekho]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]],{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|5-6}}
document_data.Description: In 1480 DR, Rathloff had white hair.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|46}}
document_data.Activities:
Before [[1479 DR]], Rathloff was a prolific scholar. He was one of the few individuals who knew about the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]], and actively opposed them.

In 1480 DR, he was corrupted by the evil [[magic]] used by [[Inar Venenellin|Pyrultimus]],{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|34-36}} and soon Rathloff became obsessed with freeing the [[primordial]] [[Cirotralech]] from his ancient prison.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|26}}
document_data.Possessions: His [[spellbook]] was a moldering ''[[tome of the north wind]]''.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|31}}
